## Kubernetes Examples

### Minimal Deployment

```yaml
apiVersion: dynamo.nvidia.com/v1alpha1
kind: DynamoGraphDeploymentRequest
metadata:
  name: <component>-minimal
spec:
  # Minimal configuration
```

### Production Deployment

```yaml
apiVersion: dynamo.nvidia.com/v1alpha1
kind: DynamoGraphDeploymentRequest
metadata:
  name: <component>-production
spec:
  # Full configuration with all options
```
